projects.name: Hostal Management System
projects.description:
Created an application that allows user to keep track on hostellers & wardens information. 
 Different responsibilities were given to admin & employees where, admin and employees have different permissions to alter the data of the system.

projects.name: One Click Share
projects.description: Designed frontend for an application where user can analyse their social media accounts and can share post to all the social media accounts in one click.

projects.name: Password Manager
projects.description: A simple user-friendly application where users can store their passwords and can access to it anytime anywhere. Moreover, my application also give suggestions of strong passwords.

projects.name: Currency Rate Converter
projects.description: Developed an application that allows user to compare the price of different currencies in real-time. Users can discover about any currency by double tapping, it will immediately redirect to a browser and open ups all the information related to the currency selected.
